name: Path of the Flower
description:
Dear friends, we present to you a tech demo of the game "Path of the Flower" for the Windows platform. In this game a samurai goes to execute a deadly order to win the emperor's favor and reunite with the princess! 

 You'll have to face bandits and spiders! Use your wits to defeat the great evil! Take care of your nerves! 

The demo version of the game was worked on:

Kate Yantser - Composer and Sound Designer 

  • https://vk.com/kateyantser 
  • https://soundcloud.com/user-134097807

Liar Like Pixels - Artist

  • https://vk.com/liarlikepixels  
  • https://twitter.com/LiarLikePixels  

White frog - Programmer

  • https://vk.com/whitefroggames 

 Some of the sounds are taken from the site:  https://zvukipro.com

 Controls:

W / A / S / D move SPACE attack SHIFT run CTRL dodge Q use items ARROW RIGHT / ARROW LEFT  switch the selected item in the inventory
